title: Escape velocity - satellites launched two planets

content.question: Satellite <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is launched vertically from the surface of Planet <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, which has mass <math alttext="M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>M</mi></math> and radius <math alttext="uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math>, while Satellite <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> is launched vertically from the surface of Planet <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, which has mass <math alttext="The fraction M over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> and radius <math alttext="2 uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi></math>, as shown. Which of the following correctly compares the escape speeds <math alttext="v sub escape, 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc,1</mtext></msub></math> and <math alttext="v sub escape, 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc,2</mtext></msub></math> of Satellite <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and Satellite <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="v sub escape, 1, is less than v sub escape, 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc,1</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc,2</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="v sub escape, 1, equals v sub escape, 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc,1</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc,2</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="v sub escape, 1, is greater than v sub escape, 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc,1</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc,2</mtext></msub></math>
The comparison of the escape speeds cannot be made without knowing the masses of the satellites.
